   16: 
   17: -module(conf_reload_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -import(reload_helper, [reload_through_ctl/2]).
   25: 
   26: -define(RELOADED_DOMAIN, ct:get_config(ejabberd_reloaded_domain)).
   27: 
   28: -define(SAMPLE_USERNAME, <<"astrid">>).
   29: -define(RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER, astrid).
   30: -define(INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER, alice).
   31: 
   32: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   33: %% Suite configuration
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     [{group, xmpp_domain_local_reload}].
   38: 
   39: groups() ->
   40:     [{xmpp_domain_local_reload, [],
   41:       [domain_should_change,
   42:        user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_ctl,
   43:        user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_xmpp,
   44:        user_should_be_disconnected_from_removed_domain]}].
   45: 
   46: suite() ->
   47:     [{required, ejabberd_reloaded_domain} | escalus:suite()].
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Init & teardown
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: 
   53: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   54:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config0),
   55:     ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config1).
   56: 
   57: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   58:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   59: 
   60: init_per_group(xmpp_domain_local_reload, Config0) ->
   61:     F = fun(Cfg) ->
   62:                 change_domain_in_config_file(Cfg)
   63:         end,
   64:     Config1 = create_user_in_initial_domain(?INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER,
   65:                                             Config0),
   66:     [{new_hosts_value, [?RELOADED_DOMAIN]},
   67:      {modify_config_file_fun, F} | Config1].
   68: 
   69: end_per_group(xmpp_domain_local_reload, Config) ->
   70:     delete_user_in_initial_domain(?INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER, Config).
   71: 
   72: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0) ->
   73:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0),
   74:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Config1),
   75:     run_config_file_modification_fun(Config1),
   76:     Config1.
   77: 
   78: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   79:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config),
   80:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Config),
   81:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd).
   82: 
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: %% Tests
   85: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   86: 
   87: domain_should_change(Config) ->
   88:     %% GIVEN
   89:     NewHosts = ?config(new_hosts_value, Config),
   90:     ?assertNot(NewHosts == get_ejabberd_hosts()),
   91: 
   92:     %% WHEN
   93:     reload_through_ctl(default_node(Config), Config),
   94: 
   95:     %% THEN
   96:     ?assertMatch(NewHosts, get_ejabberd_hosts()).
   97: 
   98: user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_ctl(Config) ->
   99:     %% GIVEN
  100:     [NewHost] = ?config(new_hosts_value, Config),
  101:     ?assertMatch({cannot_register, _},
  102:                  register_user_by_ejabberd_admin(?SAMPLE_USERNAME, NewHost)),
  103: 
  104:     %% WHEN
  105:     reload_through_ctl(default_node(Config), Config),
  106: 
  107:     %% THEN
  108:     ?assertMatch({ok, _},
  109:                  register_user_by_ejabberd_admin(?SAMPLE_USERNAME, NewHost)),
  110:     ?assertMatch({ok, _},
  111:                  unregister_user_by_ejabberd_admin(?SAMPLE_USERNAME, NewHost)).
  112: 
  113: user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_xmpp(Config) ->
  114:     %% GIVEN
  115:     UserDomain = get_user_domain(?RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER),
  116:     ?assert(lists:member(UserDomain, ?config(new_hosts_value, Config))),
  117: 
  118:     %% WHEN
  119:     reload_through_ctl(default_node(Config), Config),
  120: 
  121:     %% THEN
  122:     ?assertMatch(ok, create_user(?RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER, Config)),
  123:     ?assertMatch({ok, result, _},
  124:                  delete_user(?RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER, Config)).
  125: 
  126: user_should_be_disconnected_from_removed_domain(Config) ->
  127:     %% GIVEN
  128:     Conn = connect_user(?INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER, Config),
  129: 
  130:     %% WHEN
  131:     reload_through_ctl(default_node(Config), Config),
  132: 
  133:     %% THEN
  134:     ?assertNot(escalus_connection:is_connected(Conn)).
  135: 
  136: 
  137: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  138: %% Internal functions
  139: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  140: 
  141: get_ejabberd_hosts() ->
  142:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [hosts]).
  143: 
  144: register_user_by_ejabberd_admin(User, Host) ->
  145:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_admin, register, [User, Host, <<"doctor">>]).
  146: 
  147: unregister_user_by_ejabberd_admin(User, Host) ->
  148:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_admin, unregister, [User, Host]).
  149: 
  150: change_domain_in_config_file(Config) ->
  151:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file(
  152:       [mk_value_for_hosts_pattern(?RELOADED_DOMAIN)], Config).
  153: 
  154: mk_value_for_hosts_pattern(Domain) ->
  155:     {hosts, "[\"" ++ binary_to_list(Domain) ++ "\"]"}.
  156: 
  157: run_config_file_modification_fun(Config) ->
  158:     Fun = ?config(modify_config_file_fun, Config),
  159:     Fun(Config).
  160: 
  161: create_user_in_initial_domain(User, Config) ->
  162:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([User])).
  163: 
  164: delete_user_in_initial_domain(User, Config) ->
  165:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([User])).
  166: 
  167: connect_user(User, Config) ->
  168:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
  169:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec),
  170:     Conn.
  171: 
  172: get_user_domain(User) ->
  173:     {User, UserSpec} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(User),
  174:     proplists:get_value(server, UserSpec).
  175: 
  176: create_user(User, Config) ->
  177:     {User, UserSpec} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(User),
  178:     Result = escalus_users:create_user(Config, {User, UserSpec}),
  179:     escalus_users:verify_creation(Result).
  180: 
  181: delete_user(User, Config) ->
  182:     {User, UserSpec} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(User),
  183:     escalus_users:delete_user(Config, {User, UserSpec}).
  184: 
  185: default_node(Config) ->
  186:     Node = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_node, Config),
  187:     Node == undefined andalso error(node_undefined, [Config]),
  188:     Node.
